activities:
ITS collects personal information from their customers (travelers) necessary to book travel.  The organization then transmits this data ("EU GDS Data") to the Sabre GDS in the United States.  The EU GDS Data includes data typical to book travel.  

ITS receives information from their clients (hiring organizations) and is provided PNR information.  The EU reporting data is very similar to the “EU GDS Data” listed above and is used to provide reports to the hiring clients for their exclusive use.  This data could also be shared with an EU based reporting organization.
personaldata: client and/or customer,Yes possibly manually processed
privacyprograms: a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
